attributes.action: make Tony 'Bomber' Brown ex WBA football player a Sir
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to recognise the achievements of Tony Brown. West Bromwich Albions all time record appearances and record goal scorer. And also his current work with the club and supporters, the man is a legend and if any footballer is to be made a Sir, he should be one of the first on the list.
